ygData.subject: RE: RE: RE: Bellow song Damage
ygData.msgSnippet: I was soloing kobolds here for a while.  Once they get down to half health, just fire up fear/chains and finish them off while they re stopped dead in their
ygData.messageBody:
I was soloing kobolds here for a while. Once they get down to half health,
just fire up fear/chains and finish them off while they're stopped dead in
their tracks. You really only have to kill half a kobold :)
I once even got extremly lucky here and managed to kill 2 at once with
charm. Not bad for such a confined space. Mind you I tried the same thing
later and got thoroughly whomped.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard
Erollisi Marr

<snip>

From: <kim@...>

Just for yucks, I decided to try soloing a greater kobold in
Sol B (usually L35 or so) at level 40. I played Hymn,
Warsong, Psalm of Cooling, and Chain, trying as hard as I
could to keep all 4 effects going (probably succeeded about
half the time). When I dropped below half health, I switched
to Pixie Strike/Hymn with a lute while I healed up. I did
this right in front of a little-used zone line for reasons of
safety.
